intro.speaker: Garon
intro.line: You have done well to return to us, Gunter. Welcome back.

intro.speaker: Gunter
intro.line: Thank you, King Garon.

intro.speaker: Garon
intro.line: To think you fell into the depths of the Bottomless Canyon... It must have been quite the ordeal. I am pleased to see you alive and well.

intro.speaker: Hans
intro.line: Heh heh, welcome back, Sir Gunter.

intro.speaker: Garon
intro.line: Enough of that. I would like to discuss our next endeavor. Soon Nohr and Hoshido will be engaged in an all-out war. Our army will set up base here in Cyrkensia and immediately send troops to Hoshido. If we catch them by surprise, we may be able to secure a win early on. Corrin, I'm putting you in charge of the Hoshidan infiltration.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: ...As you wish, Father.

intro.speaker: Garon
intro.line: Hmm...good boy/girl. Go by sea rather than taking the overland route. The Hoshidans will expect us to go by land and may be waiting to ambush. We shall outsmart them at every turn. In the meantime, I will return to Castle Krakenburg. I will monitor the situation from there and send more soldiers when the time is right. Iago, Hans, you two will come with me.

intro.speaker: Hans
intro.line: Certainly, my king.

intro.speaker: Iago
intro.line: Understood, King Garon.

intro.speaker: Garon
intro.line: I have high hopes for you, my child.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: I shall do my best to bring back good news, Father.

intro.speaker: Iago
intro.line: Before you depart, Lord/Lady Corrin, I must ask... Where exactly did you and Lady Azura disappear to last night?

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Hm?

intro.speaker: Iago
intro.line: Was I not clear? Then I shall repeat myself. I saw you follow Lady Azura into the night. Very suspicious, if you ask me. I shudder to even suggest it, but in times like these.. You weren't meeting with Hoshidan spies by any chance, were you?

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Nothing of the sort. She and I just went for a little stroll in the moonlight.

intro.speaker: Iago
intro.line: A stroll? You expect us to believe that?

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: I do, as it is the truth. I was rattled after the attack on Father in Nestra. Azura suggested we walk through the forest to calm my nerves. While we were gone, we ran into a strange group of soldiers. Naturally, we eliminated them all.

intro.speaker: Iago
intro.line: What?! Y-you did?

intro.speaker: Azura
intro.line: Corrin...

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: As sharp as you are, surely you noticed the new blood stains on my armor. There's your proof. I'm not sure who they were, but they threatened the royal family. That alone is reason enough to destroy every last one of them, is it not? After all, rebellions are like seeds. We must salt the earth before they can sprout. ...Have I acted out of line?

intro.speaker: Iago
intro.line: N-no, milord/milady. You are a role model to us all...

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Thank you, Iago. Let that be the last time I hear you question my loyalty. Father, if you'll please excuse me.

intro.speaker: Garon
intro.line: Go.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Phew. That was close...

intro.speaker: Azura
intro.line: Corrin... May I ask why you lied to Iago just then?

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Well, it wasn't a complete lie... They may have been monsters, but we DID vanquish strange soldiers that attacked us. I merely left out the details of where the actual fight took place.

intro.speaker: Azura
intro.line: Ah, I see. So you said all that to gain King Garon's trust?

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Precisely. If we want our plan to succeed, it's imperative that Father trusts us. Winning the war won't matter if we can't convince him to sit on the throne.

intro.speaker: Azura
intro.line: That makes perfect sense. Sorry, I guess I was just caught off guard. Hearing you speak like him so casually... It was unsettling.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Oh wow, I must be a better actor/actress than I thought. Sorry, but until this war is over, you'll have to get used to seeing me like that. I'll have to grow comfortable with that disguise, at least in front of Father. No matter how hard it is... Or how it tortures me.

intro.speaker: Azura
intro.line: I suppose so...

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Hey, Leo, isn't our boat due to arrive soon?

intro.speaker: Leo
intro.line: It is. Patience, Corrin. Ah, that reminds me. Iago gave me some extra funds for our war chest. He said he hoped it would prove useful.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: What?! He really gave us this much?

intro.speaker: Leo
intro.line: I was also surprised. I'm not sure what's gotten into him. Prying money from Iago is usually like trying to take a baby bird from its mother. But we'll take what we can get, I suppose.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Too true. We should take this opportunity to stock up on supplies before we leave.

intro.speaker: Leo
intro.line: Excellent idea. Hm? Corrin! Behind you!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Huh?!

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: Well done, Corrin! Your reflexes have vastly improved since last I surprise attacked you.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Xander!!

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: It's been too long, little prince.

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: Hello, little princess.

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: I'm pleased to find you in good health and spirits. I heard the Rainbow Sage granted you new strength. Congratulations.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Thanks, Xander! But sheesh, did you have to give me such a fright! We haven't seen each other in ages, yet the first thing you do is test my reflexes! I guess some people never change. By the way, what brings you here?

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: I finally completed the mission Father tasked me with. It was quite arduous. The first thing I did after reporting back was come after you. If you're to infiltrate Hoshido, I'm going with you. It's not negotiable.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Xander... Thank you! Having you on my side is like having a thousand extra soldiers.

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: That is kind of you to say, if not a bit of an exaggeration.

intro.speaker: Laslow
intro.line: Lord Xander! It's great to see you again. We did our best to make you proud.

intro.speaker: Peri
intro.line: MILORD! I missed you so much! I made sure to keep Lord/Lady Corrin safe even though she didn't let me kill things!

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: Well done, both of you. I am grateful for your efforts to protect my brother/sister.

intro.speaker: Laslow
intro.line: Wow... Praise from the great Lord Xander. It's a little embarrassing!

intro.speaker: Peri
intro.line: Heehee, I'm an expert at making baddies suffer, so it was a piece of cake!

intro.speaker: Leo
intro.line: Now that Xander has joined us, the whole family is finally together again.

intro.speaker: Camilla
intro.line: That's a good point, Leo! It makes me so happy to be near all of my beloved siblings.

intro.speaker: Elise
intro.line: Even better, we have a new sister to welcome to the fold! Right, Azura?

intro.speaker: Azura
intro.line: Y-yes, that's right. Sorry, I don't wish to intrude on your reunion...

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: Azura? Can it be...our kidnapped sister?

intro.speaker: Azura
intro.line: You remember me?

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: Of course. Though not as much as I would have liked, we met a handful of times. I especially remember how horribly the other Nohrians treated you back then...

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: They did? But why?

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: Azura is the child of Father's second wife, the late Queen Arete. When they married, many Nohrians were still distraught over my mother's death. Those who loved Queen Katerina were not happy about Queen Arete or her daughter. Camilla and I...and later Leo...were told not to associate with Azura because of this. I suppose Father wanted to protect the strength of his legacy or some nonsense. However, we always wished we could be close with her, as siblings should be. I can't tell you how happy I am to have you here with us Azura.

intro.speaker: Azura
intro.line: Xander... Thank you. Your words have touched me deeply. You are truly as kind as Corrin made you out to be.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: This is wonderful. Now we can all be the big, happy family we were meant to be!

intro.speaker: Elise
intro.line: YEAH!! Let's all go to Hoshido together! It will be an adventure!

intro.speaker: Camilla
intro.line: Elise, darling, we're not going to play. Make sure to behave yourself.

intro.speaker: Leo
intro.line: It's true. We should all mentally prepare ourselves for the battle looming ahead. Traipsing into enemy territory isn't going to be easy.

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: Worry not, Leo. No task is too great for the Nohrian royal siblings. Isn't that right, Corrin?

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Right, We'll find a way to win this war together. And I'll protect all of you... That's a promise.

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: The wind is at our backs, and there are no Hoshidan ships in sight. So far, so good.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Yes, things are going quite smoothly. I hope it stays this way...

intro.speaker: Nohrian
intro.line: Lord Xander! Lord/Lady Corrin! Pirates are aboard the ship. They're raiding our war chest!

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: What?! Where did they come from?

intro.speaker: Nohrian
intro.line: I'm sorry, milord, but they must have snuck aboard before we set sail.

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: That's not possible. Unless...those are no ordinary pirates. To pull off such a stealthy move, they can be none other than Hoshidan ninja. Corrin, follow me.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: OK!

battle.speaker: Xander
battle.line: Hmm... To make it this far, they must be quite skilled and highly organized. Somebody is clearly leading the charge. If we take down the leader, the rest will fall.

battle.speaker: Leo
battle.line: Agreed, but I can't figure out who it is. They're all acting in unison.

battle.speaker: Xander
battle.line: Then perhaps... Their leader is not among them.

battle.speaker: Leo
battle.line: Hm? Ah! I see.. Nice thinking, Xander. After all, Hoshidan ninja are masters of disguise. Their leader must be masquerading as a Nohrian soldier, giving orders on the sly. That means we'll have to speak to each of our soldiers directly to smoke him out.

battle.speaker: Xander
battle.line: Let's move quickly. The longer this skirmish takes, the more we stand to lose.

battle.speaker: Nohrian
battle.line: I haven't seen anyone that looks like an enemy commander yet... Wha—?! Why are you pulling on my cheeks? OW OW OW! Please stop! You'll bruise my gorgeous face! Did you think I was an enemy in disguise? Never! I'm a Nohrian through and through! Are we done here? I feel a little abused.

battle.speaker: Nohrian
battle.line: Still no sign of the enemy commander. I'm afraid. Um, do I have something in my teeth? I suppose I did eat not too long ago... Huh?! You need to inspect my face? Erm. OK. V-very well. that was...strange. If you're finished, I shall return to my post!

battle.speaker: Nohrian
battle.line: No sign of our enemy yet. Am I wearing...a disguise? Not a chance! Test me all you want. My face and my Nohrian pride are both the real deal. If you're satisfied, please allow me to return to the task at hand.

battle.speaker: Nohrian
battle.line: I haven't seen anyone suspicious around here, but I'll keep looking. Huh? You wish to inspect my face? I'm sorry—I can't allow that. I'm not hiding anything, I just... Hey, stop that! Unhand me, you fiends! I guess I have no choice...

battle.speaker: Shura
battle.line: Bah! I must be getting sloppy if you were able to see through my disguise.

battle.speaker: Xander
battle.line: Wait...that's a Nohrian pirate! But he leads his men just like ninja... And how did a common pirate manage to sneak aboard? This doesn't add up. I'll get to the bottom of this later. For now, all that matters is stopping him!

battle.speaker: Leo
battle.line: Drat... We took too long trying to find their commander. They've stolen all the money Iago gave to us. How will I explain this to Father...

boss.speaker: Shura
boss.line: Now that you've found me, I have no choice but to defeat you all! Say good-bye to your men, your war chest, and this ship!

end.speaker: Xander
end.line: This battle is over. Surrender quietly, if you know what's good for you.

end.speaker: Shura
end.line: You're right... We lost. So now what? Well?! What are you going to do with me? For what it's worth, I'd much rather live than die.

end.speaker: Xander
end.line: Don't move a muscle. If you even breathe wrong, we shall end you. Stay in the cabin until my brother/sister here decides what to do with you.

end.speaker: Shura
end.line: Yeah, sure, whatever. Why not just execute me here and now? As though I could expect anything else from Nohrian royals.

end.speaker: Azura
end.line: You must know you deserve to be punished after what you did. You may be dressed as a Nohrian pirate but...I don't understand. Why would you board a ship for Hoshido when our country is at war with them? It doesn't make any sense. Can you explain?

end.speaker: Leo
end.line: Hmph. Like a dirty thief needs a reason to do what he does best. He and his men likely just hopped aboard without thinking things through. Trying to reason with him is a waste of time, Azura.

end.speaker: Shura
end.line: Azura?! So you're the one...

end.speaker: Azura
end.line: You know who I am? How?

end.speaker: Azura
end.line: No more games. Tell me what you know, or we shall kill you and be done with it. How do you know who I am?

end.speaker: Shura
end.line: ... I know...because... I was one of the people responsible for kidnapping you all those years ago.

end.speaker: Azura
end.line: Wh-what?!

end.speaker: Shura
end.line: I was commissioned by a Hoshidan strategist named Yukimura. I led him through the secret tunnel that runs beneath Castle Krakenburg.

end.speaker: Azura
end.line: But you're Nohrian yourself, aren't you? How could you do such a thing?

end.speaker: Shura
end.line: I am no Nohrian, but a ninja from Kohga, a land that exists only in memory now. Long ago, my clan proudly served the Hoshidan royalty. Those days were long past, but I still felt I should help avenge their loss. Besides, I figured if war broke out, I could use the chaos to take down Mokushu. Heh, I don't think Yukimura even realized he had enlisted a genuine ninja from Kohga.

end.speaker: Azura
end.line: I recall learning of the destruction of Kohga by the neighboring Mokushu. Rumor has it all who lived there were brutally killed... I'm surprised you were able to escape. Is that why you became a thief?

end.speaker: Shura
end.line: After Kohga fell, I was chased from home and separated from the other survivors. I...had no choice. I was a child at the time. It was either steal or die. I chose to steal. I eventually found myself in Nohr, where I carved out a life for myself as a pirate.

end.speaker: Azura
end.line: And now that war is upon us, you wish to return home to exact your revenge?

end.speaker: Shura
end.line: Yep, spot on.

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: A former Hoshidan ninja, seeking revenge for his massacred people...

end.speaker: Shura
end.line: Please...you seem like a reasonable person. My name is Shura. Have mercy and spare my life, and I swear you won't regret it. I promise to serve and protect Lady Azura and to help you however I can. I'm not crazy about the Hoshidans, and I feel bad for helping kidnap your princess.

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: So first you stole from us, but now you want to be our ally?

end.speaker: Shura
end.line: Yeah, sorry about that stealing business. Think of it as a showcase of my skills! Come on, whaddya say? Wouldn't hurt to have somebody like me around, right?!

end.speaker: Leo
end.line: Don't listen to him, Corrin. He could be lying through his teeth. For all we know, he's a Hoshidan spy. He could warn them we're coming. Hate to say it, but if we don't kill him now, it could endanger us all.

end.speaker: Camilla
end.line: I agree, sweet brother/sister. No matter his reasons, he tried to hurt us. There's no way to ensure he won't betray us to those nasty Hoshidans. I'd never stop worrying about you if that mongrel was on the loose!

end.speaker: Xander
end.line: Silence. That choice is not ours to make. What will you do, Corrin? As our leader, this is your call to make. Are we going to kill Shura or let him go?

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: You're right... He's too dangerous to take with us. I take no pleasure in this decision, but I can't endanger my family. Your time is at an end, Shura. I'm sorry.

end.speaker: Shura
end.line: HUH?!

end.speaker: Leo
end.line: I know it's not easy, but you made the right decision.

end.speaker: Camilla
end.line: I'll feel much safer now. That's my good little Corrin!

end.speaker: Xander
end.line: Take heart, Corrin. You likely saved our lives this day. We all respect your decision to protect your loved ones at any cost. You've grown so much while I was away... Making rational choices for the greater good is what being a prince/princess is all about. I shall send a messenger to Father at once. He will be proud to learn that you brought one of Azura's kidnappers to justice. I know Father can be...difficult. But this is sure to earn you his favor.

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: Thanks, Xander. I don't know what I would do without you.

end.speaker: Shura
end.line: I suppose I'm getting what I deserve. Just make it quick.

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: ... The path I walk...is so cold. Please...let this war end soon.

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: Leo, Camilla... I know you believe this man to be dangerous. And maybe he is. But in my heart, I feel that we can trust him. I will allow him to join our cause.

end.speaker: Shura
end.line: Y-you mean it?! Thank you, milord/milady!

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: After all you've been through, Shura, I feel you're long overdue for some mercy. But know that if you place even one toe out of line, I will kill you myself. No one endangers my family. Got it?

end.speaker: Shura
end.line: Understood, milord/milady. I swear on my fallen people, I will never betray your kindness. Thank you, Lord/Lady Corrin. My life is yours now.

end.speaker: Leo
end.line: *sigh* Oh, Corrin. You're much too soft. Do recall that this is war.

end.speaker: Camilla
end.line: That's part of why we love you so much, dear Brother/Sister, but... I hope that kindness of yours never comes back to haunt you.

end.speaker: Xander
end.line: If that is your decision, then we shall respect it. I will make sure word of this never reaches Father. If he knew you intended to make an ally out of one of Azura's kidnappers... He would never trust you again.

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: I know... Thank you, Xander. I don't know what I'd do without you.

end.speaker: Xander
end.line: You'll never have to find out, little prince/princess.
